EmailTemplate.description: Request approval for additional products at a specific clearing house.
EmailTemplate.name: Clearing Permissions (approval)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Clearing permission approval request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear <Approver Full Name>,
Please approve clearing permissions being set up to clear <product1>, <product2> and <product3> at <include full clearing house name> between the below legal entities:
<Legal Entity Name 1>
<Legal Entity BIC 1>
<Legal Entity Name 2>
<Legal Entity BIC 2>
Please note all eligible currencies will clear unless private clearing rules have been set up stating otherwise.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} MarkitSERV Client Services
